title: Did the Democratic Congressman add a "woman" to the opening prayer?
subtitle: The right-wing observers went to the democracy of Missouri Emmanuel Clever after the opening of the first session of Congress 117 in January 2021.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2021, the United States Republic of America added a "woman" after the traditional "Amen" in a prayer for the opening of the 117th Congress.
